statements: SELECT * FROM Revenue_Report WHERE report_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_date, revenue FROM Revenue_Report WHERE profit_margin > 0.2;
SELECT report_id, revenue, profit_margin FROM Revenue_Report WHERE customer_retention < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM Revenue_Report ORDER BY profit_margin DESC;
SELECT report_date, customer_retention FROM Revenue_Report ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Revenue_Report ORDER BY report_date DESC, revenue ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT report_id, revenue, profit_margin FROM Revenue_Report WHERE profit_margin > 0.2 ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT AVG(revenue), SUM(profit_margin) FROM Revenue_Report WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT report_date, customer_retention FROM Revenue_Report WHERE customer_retention IS NOT NULL ORDER BY report_date LIMIT 5
SELECT report_id, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM Revenue_Report GROUP BY report_id HAVING total_revenue > 50000 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC
SELECT * FROM revenue_reports;
SELECT report_id, revenue_amount FROM revenue_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM profit_margin_reports ORDER BY profit_margin DESC;
SELECT report_id, profit_margin FROM profit_margin_reports WHERE profit_margin > 0.1;
SELECT report_id, report_date FROM revenue_reports WHERE revenue_amount > 10000;
SELECT * FROM revenue_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC, revenue_amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT report_date, revenue_amount FROM revenue_reports WHERE revenue_amount > 50000 ORDER BY report_date LIMIT 5;
SELECT report_id, MIN(revenue_amount), MAX(revenue_amount) FROM revenue_reports GROUP BY report_id HAVING MAX(revenue_amount) - MIN(revenue_amount) > 10000;

SELECT rr.report_date, rr.revenue_amount, pmr.profit_margin FROM revenue_reports rr JOIN profit_margin_reports pmr ON rr.report_id = pmr.report_id WHERE rr.revenue_amount > 50000 AND pmr.profit_margin > 0.2 ORDER BY rr.revenue_amount DESC, pmr.profit_margin ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reports, AVG(revenue_amount) AS avg_revenue FROM revenue_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM revenue_report ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT report_id, total_revenue FROM profit_margin_report WHERE total_profit > 1000;
SELECT report_id, retention_rate FROM customer_retention_report WHERE retention_rate <= 0.8 ORDER BY report_id ASC;
SELECT report_id, total_profit FROM profit_margin_report WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM revenue_report JOIN profit_margin_report ON revenue_report.report_id = profit_margin_report.report_id;
SELECT report_id, total_revenue, date FROM revenue_report ORDER BY total_revenue DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM profit_margin_report WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND total_profit > 5000;
SELECT report_id, retention_rate, date FROM customer_retention_report WHERE retention_rate < 0.8 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT report_id, total_revenue, date FROM revenue_report WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM profit_margin_report WHERE total_profit BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000 ORDER BY total_profit ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM revenue_reports;
SELECT report_date, revenue FROM profit_margin_reports WHERE profit_margin > 0.2;
SELECT customer_id, retention_rate FROM customer_retention_reports ORDER BY retention_rate DESC;
SELECT evaluation_date, overall_performance FROM business_performance_evaluation WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM profit_margin_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM revenue_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC, revenue ASC;
SELECT location_id, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM revenue_reports GROUP BY location_id HAVING total_revenue > 10000;
SELECT rr.report_id, rr.report_date, pmr.profit_margin FROM revenue_reports rr JOIN profit_margin_reports pmr ON rr.location_id = pmr.product_id;
SELECT MAX(retention_rate) AS max_retention_rate, MIN(retention_rate) AS min_retention_rate FROM customer_retention_reports;
SELECT bpe.location_id, AVG(bpe.overall_performance) AS avg_performance FROM business_performance_evaluation bpe GROUP BY location_id ORDER BY avg_performance DESC;
SELECT * FROM revenue_reports;
SELECT report_id, revenue, report_date FROM profit_margins ORDER BY profit_margin DESC;
SELECT customer_id, retention_rate, calculation_date FROM customer_retention WHERE retention_rate > 0.7;

SELECT P.performance_id, P.report_id, M.profit_margin, R.retention_rate FROM business_performance AS P JOIN profit_margins AS M ON P.margin_id = M.margin_id JOIN customer_retention AS R ON P.retention_id = R.retention_id;
SELECT history_id, performance_id, report_date FROM performance_history WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM revenue_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, revenue, report_date FROM revenue_reports WHERE revenue > 5000;
SELECT * FROM profit_margins WHERE DATE(date_calculated) = CURDATE();

SELECT performance_score, report_date FROM business_performance JOIN performance_history ON business_performance.performance_id = performance_history.performance_id WHERE performance_score > 8 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT performance_id, customer_id, retention_rate FROM customer_retention WHERE retention_rate < 0.8;
